meanings.definition: The act or process of inscribing or writing letters.
meanings.sent1: I practiced my letterings by writing the alphabet multiple times.
meanings.sent2: The artist's beautiful letterings adorned the cover of the book.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's impeccable letterings on the chalkboard made the students smile.
meanings.sent4: Her letterings danced across the page like graceful ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The intricate letterings etched on the monument captured the attention of all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The design or style of writing letters.
meanings.sent1: The calligrapher's unique letterings were admired by all who saw them.
meanings.sent2: The font used in the logo had a modern and sleek letterings.
meanings.sent3: His letterings were so fancy that they almost looked like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: The letterings on the sign were bold and eye-catching, drawing customers in.
meanings.sent5: The vintage letterings on the postcard gave it a nostalgic feel.

meanings.definition: The letters or characters used in writing.
meanings.sent1: The ancient manuscript contained mysterious letterings that scholars were trying to decipher.
meanings.sent2: The ransom note had shaky and uneven letterings, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent3: The letterings on the keyboard were worn out from years of use.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were hidden behind the cryptic letterings of his text messages.
meanings.sent5: The intricate letterings on the map indicated hidden treasures waiting to be found.
